title: It's insane how people are allowed to literally, straight up troll, yet you get banned for chat.
body:
This guy's champ pool (his overall winrate across hundreds of games is negative)  is all over the place, then, he pops into my game and locks in Lee. He played 21 games and has a 43% WR. That's literally trolling to keep playing that champion at that WR.

It's insane how some people intentionally go into a game to just destroy it and nothing happens to them, yet you type and get the perma.
